@dav_is_dev @vincpa @ianfeather They certainly have. But there is more in play than that. That was the point of sharing this data with us. When clients connect from via mobile data plans, or on trains, or slow wifi, or under powered devices, we get to see how fragile js can be. Sadly this stat is not unique.
